title: AI Data Analyst
subtitle: Transform raw data into actionable insights with automated analysis and reporting
description: Deploy AI analysts that connect to your data sources, clean and analyze data, identify trends and anomalies, and generate executive-ready reports—no manual spreadsheet work required.

benefits.title: Automated Data Collection
benefits.description: Pull data from 50+ sources including Google Analytics, Salesforce, Stripe, ad platforms, and databases—all synced to a central warehouse automatically.

benefits.title: Intelligent Analysis
benefits.description: AI identifies trends, correlations, outliers, and patterns in your data—surfacing insights humans might miss in massive datasets.

benefits.title: Natural Language Queries
benefits.description: Ask questions in plain English like 'What drove the revenue spike last week?' and get instant answers with supporting visualizations.

benefits.title: Predictive Forecasting
benefits.description: Use machine learning models to forecast sales, predict churn, estimate demand, and identify risks before they impact your business.

features.title: Executive Dashboards
features.description: Auto-generate real-time dashboards showing KPIs, trends, and performance metrics tailored to each department or stakeholder.

features.title: Trend Detection
features.description: Automatically identify upward/downward trends, seasonal patterns, and unusual spikes—with alerts when metrics cross thresholds.

features.title: Automated Reporting
features.description: Schedule weekly, monthly, or quarterly reports that compile data from multiple sources into polished PDFs or interactive dashboards.

features.title: Anomaly Alerts
features.description: Get instant notifications when data shows unexpected changes: sudden traffic drops, revenue dips, or unusual user behavior.

features.title: Data Cleaning
features.description: Automatically fix formatting issues, remove duplicates, fill missing values, and standardize data from inconsistent sources.

features.title: Multi-Source Integration
features.description: Combine data from CRM, marketing platforms, finance tools, and product analytics into unified analysis without manual exports.

useCases.title: Marketing ROI Analysis
useCases.description: Track campaign performance across Google Ads, Facebook, email, and organic—calculating true ROI by attributing revenue to each channel automatically.

useCases.title: Sales Performance Tracking
useCases.description: Analyze win rates, deal velocity, pipeline health, and rep productivity by pulling CRM data daily and generating leaderboards and forecasts.

useCases.title: Customer Behavior Insights
useCases.description: Identify which features drive retention, predict churn risk for individual accounts, and segment users by engagement patterns for targeted outreach.

metrics.efficiency: Save 30+ hours per week on manual reporting
metrics.speed: Generate insights in minutes, not days
